attributes.action: Support a vote of no confidence in Mayor Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details:
Support a vote of no confidence in Mayor Boris Johnsons, he pledged no front line cuts, and is now slashing the Police and Fire Service, seriously putting Londoners lives at risk. He is out of control and has only one ambition of getting to be PM not the welfare of Londoners.
This Petition is to show Londoners and people who work there that we do not feel safe.
